Parameter.description: The file format to output images in.
Parameter.name: ImageType

Parameter.description: The width of the output image.
Parameter.name: Width

Parameter.description: The way to represent colors in the output image.
Parameter.name: Colors

Parameter.description: The height of the output image.
Parameter.name: Height

Parameter.description:
How to deal with used input images once an overlay is applied.
Cycle: Cycle through input images in the input folder. Start from the beginning once the last one is used.
Move: Move used images to a subfolder within the image input folder.
Delete: Delete images from the input folder once an overlay is applied.
Parameter.name: ImageConsumptionMode

Parameter.description: The file format to output images in.
Parameter.name: ImageType

Parameter.description: A folder of images to apply the overlay to.
Parameter.name: ImageFolder

Parameter.description: The percentage of data in the input image to be overwritten with embedded data. At 25%, the visual difference with be unnoticeable for most images. At 50%, some artifacts will be noticeable in smaller images or when looking at an image zoomed in.
Parameter.name: InsertionDensity

Parameter.description:
How to deal with used input images once an overlay is applied.
Cycle: Cycle through input images in the input folder. Start from the beginning once the last one is used.
Move: Move used images to a subfolder within the image input folder.
Delete: Delete images from the input folder once an overlay is applied.
Parameter.name: ImageConsumptionMode

Parameter.description: The file format to output images in.
Parameter.name: ImageType

Parameter.description: A folder of images to apply the overlay to.
Parameter.name: ImageFolder

Parameter.description: The percentage of data in the input image to be overwritten with embedded data. At 25%, the visual difference with be unnoticeable for most images. At 50%, some artifacts will be noticeable in smaller images or when looking at an image zoomed in.
Parameter.name: InsertionDensity

Parameter.description: The number of bytes of input data to put in each output file.
Parameter.name: blockSize

Parameter.description: The encoding of bytes to output text as.
Parameter.name: encoding
